query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO QUERY (STATUS_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION, SQL_STATEMENT, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED, DATE_LAST_RUN, NUM_RUNS, RUN_TIME, SIB_REQUIREMENT, RESEARCH_PROPOSAL, WHERE_CLAUSE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,sysdate,?,?,?,?,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE QUERY SET STATUS_ID=?,NAME=?,DESCRIPTION=?, SQL_STATEMENT=?,DATE_LAST_RUN=?,NUM_RUNS=?,RUN_TIME=?, SIB_REQUIREMENT=?,RESEARCH_PROPOSAL=?,APPROVER_ID=?, WHERE_CLAUSE=?, DATE_UPDATED=sysdate,UPDATE_ID=? WHERE QUERY_ID=?
